bibl.title: P. Vindob. G 14965 (= CPR IX 67) + 18880: Requisitioned Workers in Eighth-Century Egypt.
bibl.note: The two fragments C.P.R. IX, 67 and P. Vindob. Graec. Inv. 18880 [ed.: Johannes DIETHART, Listen und Verzeichnisse byzantinisch-arabischer Zeit aus der Papyrussammlung der Ã–sterreichischen Nationalbibliothek, ArchPF 45 (1999) pp. 62-63 et pll. XIII-XIV] are contiguous. Re-edition and commentary. The list (area of Heracleopolis) mentions two Muslim villagers.
bibl.seg: GONIS Nikolaos, P. Vindob. G 14965 (= CPR IX 67) + 18880: Requisitioned Workers in Eighth-Century Egypt.
